content: उपधिः [उप-धा-कि] {@--1@} Fraud, dishonesty; अरिषु हि विजयार्थिनः क्षितीशा विदधति सोपधि संधिदूषणानि <ls>Ki. 1. 45</ls>, see अनुपधि also. {@--2@} (In law) Suppression of the truth, a false suggestion; <ls>Ms. 8. 165.</ls> {@--3@} Terror, threat, compulsion, false inducement; बलोपधिविनिर्वृत्तान् व्यवहारान्निवर्तयेत् <ls>Y. 2. 31</ls>, <ls n="Y. 2.">89.</ls> {@--4@} The part of a wheel between the nave and the circumference, or the wheel itself. {@--5@} Foundation (with the Buddhists).
